edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.controller.notification

Class EmailNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.controller.notification.EmailNotification

  • public class EmailNotification
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class that will send out email notifications whenever a game is successfully created.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EmailNotification(Game g)
      Constructs an email notification for a given game

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void sendEmail(edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.core.models.User user)
      This method uses the javaMail API library to send an email to the user This code is inspired by http://www.mkyong.com/java/javamail-api-sending-email-via-gmail-smtp-example/
      void sendEmails()
      This method implements the sendEmail method to send email notifications to all the users on a team

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • sendEmails

        public void sendEmails()
        This method implements the sendEmail method to send email notifications to all the users on a team

      • sendEmail

        public void sendEmail(edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.core.models.User user)
        This method uses the javaMail API library to send an email to the user This code is inspired by http://www.mkyong.com/java/javamail-api-sending-email-via-gmail-smtp-example/
        Parameters:
        user - The user to be emailed.
